expectations.name: {} may contain ssn
expectations.constraint: CAST({} AS STRING) NOT REGEXP('^\\d{3}-\\d{2}-\\d{4}$') AS result

expectations.name: {} may contain expiry date
expectations.constraint: CAST({} AS STRING) NOT REGEXP('^\\d{2}/\\d{2}$') AS result

expectations.name: {} may contain security code
expectations.constraint: CAST({} AS STRING) NOT REGEXP('^\\d{3}$') AS result

expectations.name: {} may contain email address
expectations.constraint: CAST({} AS STRING) NOT REGEXP('([a-zA-Z0-9+._-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9._-]+\.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)') AS result

expectations.name: {} may contain iban
expectations.constraint: CAST({} AS STRING) NOT REGEXP('[a-zA-Z]{2}[0-9]{2}[a-zA-Z0-9]{4}[0-9]{7}([a-zA-Z0-9]?)+') AS result

expectations.name: {} may contain us_address
expectations.tag: {} may contain partially anonymised us address

expectations.name: {} may contain phone_number
expectations.constraint: CAST({} AS STRING) NOT REGEXP('((\\(\\d{3}\\) ?)|(\\d{3}-))?\\d{3}-\\d{4}') AS result

expectations.name: {} may contain date_of_birth
expectations.tag: {} may contain unredacted date of birth

expectations.name: {} may contain age
expectations.constraint: CAST({} AS STRING) NOT REGEXP('^(?:1[8-9]|[2-9][0-9])$') AS result
